text: I just finished this package of coffee, and I'm going right out to buy another package of it!  I've enjoyed this Starbucks Natural Fusions, Vanilla so very much.  It has just the right amount of bite, sweetness, and beautiful aroma.  It's a very fine grind, and it was perfect for my French Press, which I find to be the best way to get that perfect cup of coffee.  Starbucks has done it again with this beautiful combination.  I've found my go-to coffee!  Thanks Starbucks!!
